ygData.subject: Re: NWO home
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright this is getting out of hands. If you have it against Tankor, why not tell him directly by PRIVATE EMAIL... Rudra could moderate you, but what good

Alright this is getting out of hands. If you have it against Tankor, 
why not tell him directly by PRIVATE EMAIL...
Rudra could moderate you, but what good would that do? Slow the 
game? Isn't slow enough like that? His job here is to make the rpg 
work just as it is my job, which I am doing right now by the way. This 
means that we try to keep a good attitude between people.
Also, I think that Tankor did not mode but that his hyper-lengthy 
absences just disrupt the flow of the game and that is what happened. 
THAT is getting annoying.
Finally, I'd like it if people would at least try to stay polite to 
each other, and that means you as well, Rudra. I think you'll know 
what I mean. I'm not saying I'm better than anyone here and I feel 
that there are many players better than me, but I think respect should 
be the guideline around here.

If that is the last OOC post for some time, maybe I'll feel like I'm 
not doing this for nothing.

ps: I will not moderate the jackass who answers this post on the rpg, 
but you can be sure he'll hear of me being mad. Ya don't want that.

pps: I don't mind private emails though. I don't always get it through 
Hotmail, so you can use n.marion@... too.
